meanings.sent1: He is the bluffest player on the team, always pretending to be confident.
meanings.sent2: The bluffest rock in the canyon stood tall against the wind.
meanings.sent3: The bluffest cowboy in the Wild West wore a hat too big for his head.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the bluffest shield against any criticism.
meanings.sent5: The bluffest mountain in the range cast a long shadow over the valley.

meanings.sent1: She spoke bluffest when trying to convince others of her plan.
meanings.sent2: The wind howled bluffest through the cracks in the old cabin.
meanings.sent3: The comedian delivered his jokes bluffest, making everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Time passed bluffest during their exciting adventure.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed bluffest after the heavy rainfall.
